required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Preventing Excessive Weight Gain and Maternal and Infant Fat Accretion
clinical_study.official_title: Preventing Excessive Weight Gain and Maternal and Infant Fat Accretion by Increasing Fiber Intake and Changing the Maternal Microbiome During Pregnancy

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to learn if consuming a high fiber diet will reduce gestational weight gain and maternal and infant fat accretion.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Women in the control group will participate in weekly lessons for 18 weeks on eating a high fiber diet and will received daily snacks.

primary_outcome.measure: Maternal weight and fat accretion changes
primary_outcome.description: Assess weight and fat accretion change between groups using the Selinger four-compartment model

primary_outcome.measure: Identify changes in fiber intake and dietary quality
primary_outcome.description: Compare fiber intake and dietary quality between groups by using 24-hour dietary recalls

secondary_outcome.description: Assess differences in gut microbiome composition and diversity between the group using 16S V4 sequencing
Identify differences in early infant fat accrual between group by completing body composition measurements including but not limited to Dual energy x-ray absorptiometry (DXA) and PeaPod

secondary_outcome.measure: Metabolic, inflammatory, and brain health markers
secondary_outcome.description: Identify changes in metabolic, inflammatory and brain health markers by analyzing blood samples and using the National Institute of Health (NIH) Toolbox
Identify differences between groups in breast milk composition using mild-infrared spectroscopy

arm_group.description: Women in the usual care group, will received standard care from the obstetrician.
Women in high fiber group will receive education on consuming a high fiber diet, including weekly lessons and daily snacks.

intervention.description: A registered dietitian will delivered the lessons on consuming a high fiber diet to small groups to increased engage and material retention. These lessons will last 18 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pre-pregnancy BMI 18.5 - 45.0 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Comsuming more than 20 g/day of fiber
- No phone and internet access
- Pre-gestational diabetes
- Diagnosed with diabetes
- Pre-eclampsia
- Hypertension
- Other metabolic abnormalities
- Asthma
- Heart disease
- Smoking
- Drug abuse
- Recent antibiotic use
- Pregnancies of multiples

facility.name: The University of Kansas Medical Center
